info.name: Healthcare API
info.description:
A comprehensive API system providing seamless integration for healthcare services. This collection includes all endpoints for authentication, user management, appointments, clinics, and system health.

## Getting Started
1. Import both the collection and environment files
2. Set up your environment variables
3. Use the Login endpoint to get your access token
4. The collection will automatically handle authentication

## Environment Variables
- baseUrl: API base URL
- accessToken: JWT access token
- refreshToken: JWT refresh token
- userId: Current user ID
- doctorId: Selected doctor ID
- clinicId: Selected clinic ID
- appointmentId: Current appointment ID
- locationId: Selected location ID
- appName: Clinic app name/subdomain
- email: User email for testing
- password: User password for testing

exec: console.log('No access token found. Please login first.');
console.log('Unauthorized. Your access token might be expired.');

item.name: Appointments
item.description: Appointment management endpoints for scheduling, updating, and canceling appointments.

request.description: Create a new appointment with specified details
Get detailed information about a specific appointment
Check a doctor's availability for a specific date
Get upcoming appointments for a specific user
Check in using QR code scan
Get QR code image for location
Generate token to join video consultation
Report technical issue with video consultation
Get all follow-up plans for patient

item.name: Clinic
item.description: Clinic management endpoints for creating and managing healthcare facilities.

request.description: Create a new clinic (Super Admin or Clinic Admin only)
Get all clinics based on user permissions
Get detailed information about a specific clinic
Assign a user as clinic admin (Super Admin only)
Get clinic details by app name/subdomain
Get all doctors associated with a clinic
Get all patients associated with a clinic

item.name: Billing
item.description: Billing and subscription management endpoints for plans, subscriptions, invoices, and payments.

request.description: Get all subscriptions for a user
Get all invoices for a user
Get all payments for a user
